Html:
hello,
I work with VS 2012.
I want to call inside typescript a method located in an external dll (which I created with C#)
Can anybody point me to an example of referencing an external dll in typescript?


Thanks for any help in advance
Markus

It's exactly how you would do it in Javascript, except that you'll declare the function you want to call in Typescript.
declare function externDLLFunc(a: any, ...): void;
